short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the extra UI from dashboards. Icon made by https://www.flaticon.com/authors/smashicons

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes non-dashboard UI and activates Full-Screen mode

Supported apps:
- Jira
- Kibana 5
- Kibana 7

https://github.com/ampersandre/clean-dash-chrome-extension
